word: BUT OUR BRETHREN SAY THAT THEY CAN'T BE IN THE LAST DAYS; BUT WE FIND THAT IT COINCIDES WITH JUST WHAT THE SAVIOUR SAID IN THE LAST CHAPTER OF MARK, IN THAT GREAT COMMISSION: "AND THESE SIGNS SHALL FOLLOW THEM THAT BELIEVE; IN MY NAME SHALL THEY CAST OUT DEVILS; THEY SHALL SPEAK WITH NEW TONGUES;" AND SO ON.
